name: Chutes de Zongo
description: Discover one of the most stunning natural wonders in the DRC, featuring powerful waterfalls surrounded by lush greenery—perfect for a nature getaway.

name: National Museum of DRC
description: A modern museum showcasing the rich cultural and historical heritage of the Democratic Republic of Congo through interactive exhibits and rare artifacts.

name: Nyiragongo Volcano
description: Hike to the summit of this active volcano and witness one of the world’s largest lava lakes—an unforgettable experience for adventure seekers.

name: Virunga National Park
description: Explore Africa’s oldest national park, home to the famous mountain gorillas, dramatic volcanoes, and an extraordinary range of wildlife.

name: Lubumbashi Zoo
description: A family-friendly spot in the heart of Lubumbashi, where you can discover local wildlife and enjoy a peaceful day surrounded by nature.

name: Texaf Bilembo
description: An innovative cultural center combining contemporary art, Congolese craftsmanship, and environmental education in a serene setting.

name: Limete Tower Exchange
description: An iconic monument offering panoramic views of Kinshasa, symbolizing unity and modernity in the capital city.

name: Nsele Valley Park
description: A vast recreational park featuring safaris, a lake, a zoo, and green spaces—ideal for families and nature lovers seeking relaxation and fun.
